name: Boost Before Forgetting
description: Boost a concept's usage so it survives a forgetting pass while an unboosted, low-usage concept is removed.

theory.natural_language: We track two notes: ImportantNote and ScratchNote. We will boost ImportantNote to increase its usage, then run forgetting with a threshold that should drop low-usage concepts. ImportantNote should survive; ScratchNote should be gone.

queries.natural_language: After boosting ImportantNote and forgetting low-usage concepts, is ImportantNote still known?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. ImportantNote was boosted above the threshold and should still be present.
expected_answer.explanation: BOOST raises usageCount; FORGET threshold=3 removes only low-usage concepts.

queries.natural_language: After the same forgetting pass, is ScratchNote still known?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. ScratchNote had low usage and should have been forgotten.
expected_answer.explanation: FORGET threshold=3 removes the unboosted ScratchNote.
